```{r factorial, echo=TRUE,cache=TRUE}

# create factorial of n!
myfactorial <- function(n) {
  fac <- 1 # 0! = 1! = 1 by definition
  for (i in 2:n) {
    fac <- fac*i
  }
  fac
}
```

```{r nchooser, echo=TRUE,cache=TRUE}

ncr <- function(n,r) {
  # Compute n Choose r using self created factorial function
  if (n == r || r == 0) # return 1 as nCr = 1
    com <- 1
  else if (n < r) # return o as n < r is not allowed/not exist
    com <- 0
  else
    com <- myfactorial(n) / (myfactorial(n - r) * myfactorial(r))
    
  com # return N choose r
}
```

```{r testchoose, echo=TRUE,eval=TRUE,background=ncr}
# Should return 1 if n=r
ncr(1,1)

ncr(5,5)

# Should return n if r=1
ncr(10,1)

# Should return 0 if n < r
ncr(4,9)

ncr(8,14)

# Should return 56 for 8C3
ncr(8,3)
```
